Component.name: Spinnable
Component.Description: A component which allows the entity to be rotated around its yaw axis by the user, or pitched up and down relative to the user's location.

FloatAttribute.name: size
FloatAttribute.description: The size measurement of the entity with which to calculate the yaw rotation.

FloatAttribute.name: drag
FloatAttribute.description: How fast the entity rotation decelerates when the user stops manipulating.

BooleanAttribute.name: isGrabbed
BooleanAttribute.description: Used by system to track component state. You should not set this manually, and always use the default value.

BooleanAttribute.name: isSpinning
BooleanAttribute.description: Used by system to track component state. You should not set this manually, and always use the default value.

FloatAttribute.name: pitch
FloatAttribute.description: Used by system to track component state. You should not set this manually, and always use the default value.
